entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 p.m. PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.0Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
